name: Hyper Space Man
description:
Run out of space by going faster than the speed of light

Hold the right mouse button to fire your thrusters and accelerate towards your cursor

Use the left mouse button to shoot

Hold the space bar to mine when over a planet or star, but beware of the enemies that spawn from planets and bosses that may spawn from star

Use the escape button to pause the game and upgrade your ship

Balance your fuel, health, mining and damage to make it out before the heat death of the universe

Tip: Stars take a while to mine, don't mine the starting star. Try to invest minerals into mining speed early on.

Good luck!
